text: w'in taejab -ayha alrswl- min edm 'iimanuhum baed hadhih al'adilat falejb alashdd min qawl alkfar: 'a'iidha mitna wakunaa turabana nubeth min jdyd? 'uwlayik hum aljahdwn birabihim aldhy awjdhm min aledm, wawlyk takun alslasl min alnaar fi 'aenaqihim yawm alqyamt, wawlyk yadkhulun alnar, wala yukhrajun minha abdana
